title: What Nidalee Skin is Better?
body: Since the Challenger Nidalee Skin recently came into the shop, I've been wondering what skin I should get out of that and Headhunter.

replies.body: Currently it's whatever doesn't look like nidalee, so my team don't  flame me for picking her.

In my opinion Headhunter is better.

Challenger just seems so overdone, and oversaturated.

Hey thanks for your opinion

I decided to get Challenger in the end as I like the fact that it's overdone with the particles and stuff because it just makes the skin so worth the 975 rp
The one you enjoy playing with. Generally for me it's the challenger skin. Sometimes I bust out headhunter or warring kingdoms because I prefer them at the time.
